person.persName: A. J. Ballard (Clerk of US Dist. Ct. Louisville)

body.p: Louisville, Kentucky, attorney. Kentucky native. Married to Frances A. Ballard. Father of Charles T. Ballard, S. Thurston Ballard, Rogers C. Ballard, Mina Ballard, and Abby Ballard. Attorney in Louisville in 1860. Owned nine enslaved persons in 1860. Clerk of the United States District Court of Kentucky in Louisville from January 11, 1862 to June 6, 1870.
